column1: Embeddable Store Badge enables you to concisely share and showcase your Store information and content on external blogs or websites. With this, you can gain visibility, popularity and Likes for your Store by attracting people. It enables people to:
column2: Embeddable Showroom Badge enables you to concisely share and showcase your Showroom information and content on external blogs or websites. With this, you can gain visibility, popularity and Likes for your Showroom by attracting people. It enables people to:

column1: Your community is currently in "Production Mode". We recommend that you momentarily switch your site to "Development Mode" so that the CSS of this plugin renders fine as soon as the plugin is installed. After completely installing this plugin and visiting few stores of your site, you may again change the System Mode back to "Production Mode" from the Admin Panel Home. (In Production Mode, caching prevents CSS of new plugins to be rendered immediately after installation.)
column2: Your community is currently in "Production Mode". We recommend that you momentarily switch your site to "Development Mode" so that the CSS of this plugin renders fine as soon as the plugin is installed. After completely installing this plugin and visiting few Showrooms of your site, you may again change the System Mode back to "Production Mode" from the Admin Panel Home. (In Production Mode, caching prevents CSS of new plugins to be rendered immediately after installation.)

column1: Enable Embeddable Badges / Like Box for the default package that was created upon installation of the "Stores / Marketplace Plugin" (If enabled, the External Badge App will also be available to Stores created so far under the default package).
column2: Enable Embeddable Badges / Like Box for the default package that was created upon installation of the "Showrooms / Marketplace Plugin" (If enabled, the External Badge App will also be available to Showrooms created so far under the default package).
